languages.text: {n}Немного подумав, Кассия качает головой.{/n} "Нет... Быть может, я и потеряю свой шанс на свободу, зато разум и силы останутся мне подвластны. Безумцам не место в Империуме. Безумным навигаторам... тем более".

traits.locale_text: {n}Немного подумав, Кассия качает головой.{/n} "Нет... Быть может, я и потеряю свой шанс на свободу, зато разум и силы останутся мне подвластны. Безумцам не место в Империуме. Безумным Навигаторам... тем более".

languages.text: {n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."
languages.original_text: {n}Немного подумав, Кассия качает головой.{/n} "Нет... Быть может, я и потеряю свой шанс на свободу, зато разум и силы останутся мне подвластны. Безумцам не место в Империуме. Безумным навигаторам... тем более".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia thinks for a moment, then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is all the more true."

{n}Cassia thinks for a moment, then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is all the more true."

{n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my shot at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is all the more true."

{n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my shot at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is all the more true."

{n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

{n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

languages.text: {n}カシアはしばらく考えた後、頭を振った。{/n}「いいえ…もしかしたら、私は自由を失うかもしれません。それでも構わない。そうすれば、私の心と力は私だけのものとなるのですから。帝国に狂気を持ち込む必要などありません。狂った航宙士なら…なおさらです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはしばらく考えた後、頭を振った。{/n}「いいえ…もしかしたら、私は自由を失うかもしれません。それでも構わない。そうすれば、私の心と力は私だけのものとなるのですから。帝国に狂気を持ち込む必要などありません。狂った航宙士なら…なおさらです」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅想了想，之后摇了摇头。{/n}“还是算了吧……虽然我可能再也无法重获自由，但至少我的思想与力量仍属于我。疯子在帝国没有容身之处，对于发疯的导航者而言……恐怕更是如此。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅想了想，之后摇了摇头。{/n}“还是算了吧……虽然这块石头可能会夺走我的自由，但至少我的思想与力量仍属于我。疯子在帝国没有容身之处，对于发疯的导航者而言……更是如此。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia piensa durante un momento y luego sacude la cabeza.{/n} «No... Aunque pierda mi oportunidad de ser libre, al menos mi mente y mis poderes seguirán siendo míos. No hay lugar para la locura en el Imperium. No digamos ya para los Navegantes locos...».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia piensa durante un momento y luego sacude la cabeza.{/n} «No... Aunque pierda mi oportunidad de ser libre, al menos mi mente y mis poderes seguirán siendo míos. No hay lugar para la locura en el Imperium. No digamos ya para los Navegantes locos...».

languages.text: {n}Cassia denkt kurz nach und schüttelt dann den Kopf.{/n} "Nein ... Vielleicht verliere ich meine Chance auf Freiheit, aber auf diese Weise kann ich meinen Verstand und meine Kräfte weiter selbst befehligen. Im Imperium ist kein Platz für Wahnsinn. Für wahnsinnige Navigatoren ... das erst recht nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia denkt kurz nach und schüttelt dann den Kopf.{/n} "Nein ... Vielleicht verliere ich meine Chance auf Freiheit, aber auf diese Weise kann ich meinen Verstand und meine Kräfte weiter selbst befehligen. Im Imperium ist kein Platz für Wahnsinn. Für wahnsinnige Navigatoren ... das erst recht nicht."

languages.text: {n}Cassia s'accorde le temps de la réflexion avant de secouer la tête.{/n} « Non... Même si cela implique de renoncer à ma liberté, j'ai bien l'intention de garder le contrôle de mon esprit et de mes pouvoirs. La folie n'a pas sa place dans l'Imperium. Et les navigateurs fous encore moins. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia s'accorde le temps de la réflexion avant de secouer la tête.{/n} « Non... Même si cela implique de renoncer à ma liberté, j'ai bien l'intention de garder le contrôle de mon esprit et de mes pouvoirs. La folie n'a pas sa place dans l'Imperium. Et les navigateurs fous encore moins. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia, bir anlığına düşünüp başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Hayır... Özgürlüğümü kazanma şansımı kaybedebilirim ancak kendi aklıma ve gücüme hâkim olabileceğim. İmparatorluk'ta deliliğe yer yoktur. Hele deli Rotacılara asla."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia thinks for a moment and then shakes her head.{/n} "No... Though I might lose my chance at freedom, my mind and my powers will remain mine to command. There is no place for madness in the Imperium. For mad Navigators... that is even more true."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia bir anlığına düşünüp baş başını iki yana sallıyor{/n} "Hayır... Özgürlüğümü kazanma şansımı kaybedebilirim ancak kendi aklıma ve gücüme kendim hâkim olacağım. İmparatorluk'ta deliliğe yer yoktur. Deli Rotacılara ise asla."
